TransmissionPST Holden I need some quick education on transmission In a paragraph or two can you explain how you go about deciding what transmission to buy for a given schedule I need to get a take on the over all strategy when buying transmission Is it based mostly on price and location Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland
Deal PST I need to get cofirmation on this deal for HE We have it in as Is this incorrect Thanks MIke

NPC TransmissionPST Please keep in mind when entering NPC transmission into Enpower Beginning July the ancillary services rate for Nevada Power has been changed from to roughly cents per MWh TOTAL per MWh Reserved transmission is LLoad HVLoad If the transmission is wheeled the should be added to the reserved price and the amount entered should be LLoad HVload The problems I see are deals entered at prices of or or deals have been entered in at the reservation charge even though they the transmission was used Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

Pac T true up for August Cc PST See attached detail on the true up and losses for Pac T Please contact me if you have any questions Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

RE PactPST The numbers now reflect a variance of Pac E dif This small differnce I can divide among the desks MP Original Message From Salisbury Holden Sent Friday October AM To Purcell Mike Subject RE Pact I have updated the deal numbers and to how I think it should be valued When it comes down to it the differential will probably not be that large Let me know what the difference is now Thanks Holden Original Message From Purcell Mike Sent Thursday October PM To Salisbury Holden Subject Pact Holden I need to true this transmiision up any word on those two resevations Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland
PactPST Holden I need to true this transmiision up any word on those two resevations Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

RE SRP deal PST You might ask Sean or Diana See what they think I know of the schedulers Dave and Bonnie but I dont think they will be much help Original Message From Salisbury Holden Sent Wednesday October PM To Purcell Mike Subject RE SRP deal The deal was done between Mark and Janice at SRP I heard him make the call Also do you have any more avenues with PAC tranny like a supervisor or something I am not really in a position to negotiate with anyone They all claim that they cant change the Oasis system Original Message From Purcell Mike Sent Monday October PM To Salisbury Holden Subject SRP deal Holden SRP is comming back saying that they do not see deal on Can you look into this Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

Pac tPST Holden Let me know when you come to a conclusion on the Pac transmission problem I didnt get any where with Paul Nofziger he told me it had to go through the traders Id like to get this done today Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland
SRP deal PST Holden SRP is comming back saying that they do not see deal on Can you look into this Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

Pac TrannyPST Holden I just the got the Pac detail on August transmission let me know when you get a second I need to go over a couple of Pac tran deals for August I need to find out how much you agreed to pay for a week long and two week long transmission reservations Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

RE Pac trannyPST Thanks HoldenWhat about that Pac tranny MP Original Message From Salisbury Holden Sent Thursday September PM To Purcell Mike Semperger Cara Subject RE Sept Pinnacle deal thanks Original Message From Purcell Mike Sent Wednesday September AM To Semperger Cara Cc Salisbury Holden Subject RE Sept Pinnacle deal alrighty thenjust let me now what the new deal number is and ill close out this dispute Thank you MP Original Message From Semperger Cara Sent Wednesday September AM To Purcell Mike Cc Salisbury Holden Alonso Tom Fischer Mark Subject RE Sept Pinnacle deal I do remember this deal we were forced to bookout by some ahole at pinwest because of the disaster and our inability to secure a scheule from DYPMI and Morgan who was upstream of AEP who was scheduling from home as was I Tom did the deal with Pinwest our buy for and I did the deal with DYPMI our sale at Index I told the SW guys about this the following day and in the mayhem the deals probably did not get put in Holden and Tom and Mark were all aware of this at the time and one of them may have also modified our deal with DYPMI They can throw those deals in or I can Just let me know Cara Original Message From Purcell Mike Sent Tuesday September PM To Semperger Cara Subject Sept Pinnacle deal Cara I have a dispute from Pinnacle West for Sept at Ive checked the sheets and the deal is in the sheet but there is no deal number This leads me to believe that there isnt a deal in Enpower The deal is PV HV and Staci remembers the problem Let me know when we can talk about this thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

RE Sept Pinnacle deal Cc PST alrighty thenjust let me now what the new deal number is and ill close out this dispute Thank you MP Original Message From Semperger Cara Sent Wednesday September AM To Purcell Mike Cc Salisbury Holden Alonso Tom Fischer Mark Subject RE Sept Pinnacle deal I do remember this deal we were forced to bookout by some ahole at pinwest because of the disaster and our inability to secure a scheule from DYPMI and Morgan who was upstream of AEP who was scheduling from home as was I Tom did the deal with Pinwest our buy for and I did the deal with DYPMI our sale at Index I told the SW guys about this the following day and in the mayhem the deals probably did not get put in Holden and Tom and Mark were all aware of this at the time and one of them may have also modified our deal with DYPMI They can throw those deals in or I can Just let me know Cara Original Message From Purcell Mike Sent Tuesday September PM To Semperger Cara Subject Sept Pinnacle deal Cara I have a dispute from Pinnacle West for Sept at Ive checked the sheets and the deal is in the sheet but there is no deal number This leads me to believe that there isnt a deal in Enpower The deal is PV HV and Staci remembers the problem Let me know when we can talk about this thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland
Pac tPST Holden Let me know when you get a chance to look at these deals and Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

PNM Parking and lendingPST Holden Can you look at this deal Its not comming through on the CARP report even after I schedule it and PNM is wondering why Also a purchase for mws isnt in the system and they are seeing it Im not sure how Parking and lending deals are entered in the system but somthing looks out of wack thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland
APS trannyPST Holden What did we decide to do with this extra month of tranny Annuity Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

NPCT Cc PST Stacy I have a tag that I think you made under West Desk The tag is showing mws of NPC t The system doesnt have this transmission in it Im checking out with NPC and I need to get your ok or Holdens to put it in Enpower Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

FW NPC T for July and PST Original Message From Purcell Mike Sent Friday August AM To Holden Salisbury Other Fax Subject NPC T for July and Holden Do you ever call in NPC t with out a reservation NPC has two blocks of mws for the th and th and I dont know who did it and it is not in Enpower It looks like it could have been preschedule with the shape of it There isnt anything in the real time sheet Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland
NPC TPST Holden Do I need a password for this site I went to the site but I cant get to the link Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

FW Enron July Final NPC Transmission Cc PST Holden Here is a message i received from Jackson We will be updating our ancillary services for NPC Original Message From Wong Jackson mailto Sent Friday August AM To Purcell Mike Subject RE Enron July Final NPC Transmission Hi Mike Starting July we have updated our energy loss rate for ancillary services from to Apparently we have been mistakenly overbilling our customers by since March Therefore a credit will be issued in the July invoice for the differences for the period from March to June Please update your total current ancillary services rate to roughly cents Thanks Jackson Original Message From mailto Sent Friday August AM To Subject Enron July Final NPC Transmission Jackson Here are our numbers for July Thanks See attached file NPCJulyFinalxls Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Deal confirmationPST Holden Can you confirm this deal with PNM Deal is through Prebon Energy Jim Thomas was the trader Month long deal starting in June deal was done on May Tom Alonso Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

RE SRP deal PST Thanks you da man mp Original Message From Salisbury Holden Sent Friday July PM To Purcell Mike Subject RE SRP deal is the right price The deal has been changed Thanks Original Message From Purcell Mike Sent Friday July AM To Alonso Tom Cc Salisbury Holden Fischer Mark Subject SRP deal Tom Can you confirm our price on this deal SRP is telling us that they see this deal at We have it at I have requested the tape from SRP MP
SRP deal Cc PST Tom Can you confirm our price on this deal SRP is telling us that they see this deal at We have it at I have requested the tape from SRP MP

APS to Pinnacle WestPST Just a reminder Make sure you are using Pinnacle West and not APS when you are putting these deals in for this counter party Weve been getting a lot of disputes related to this problem Thanks Volume Management
Thank you From Volume ManagementPST Thanks again for your attention today Let us know if you have any additional concerns or comments Thanks Mike Virginia Kourtney Jim

real time trade log filesPST Virginia and I have taken the traders files who are no longer in realtime and moved their files to the other drawer Also we have created files for some of the new traders Linder Merris Thanks Mike

RE Beavers Game ANY LEFTPST JUST CHECKING TO SEE IF YOU HAD ANYTHING LEFT FOR TONIGHT MIKE Original Message From Gustafson Mollie Sent Thursday May PM To Portland West NRON Subject Beavers Game I have tickets available for the Beavers Game tonight in the Enron Suite First person to let me know is the winner unless you won yesterday Dont forget the game will conflict wSurvivor but there is a TV in the suite Thanks Mollie

FW Smurfit Dec numbersemail below regarding Dec numbers Smurfit is showing a termination date of see attachment on what Enpower is showing I can clean this up if Smurfit is correct just let me know Thanks MP Original Message From Clevenger Patrick mailto MURFITCOM Sent Wednesday January PM To Purcell Mike Cc Confer Mark Subject RE Smurfit Dec numbers Enron was in default on supply starting and did not provide power beyond This bill is not right at all I think Enron only provided mw to and mw Bill should be for mwh at mwh at and mwh at average price of both contracts Total of Original Message From Purcell Mike mailtoMike NRONcom Sent Wednesday January PM To Pat Clevenger Email Cc Confer Mark Subject Smurfit Dec numbers File Smurfit MTDxls Pat Here are the numbers for Dec Per John Maloney the annuity to Charge you for Rampdown has been waived for the month of Dec Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland Smurfit MTDxls This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

FW City of Shasta Lakeyou look at deal Amy in Houston is having a problem with Shasta Please confim that the deal has been entered in correctly Thank you MP Original Message From Clemons Amy Sent Wednesday December AM To Purcell Mike Subject City of Shasta Lake Hey Mike Will you look at deal City of Shasta Lake sees they should pay us for this deal But there are no view actuals so it wont be in CARP or anywhere else for me to invoice them for it It is entered as a basisoption I am not familiar with those but maybe that has something to do with it Also there was a deal for Shasta that I was given the confirm for I asked Stewart to look at it and see if he knew how we should settle it Maybe the two deals are related Will you look into these two deals and let me know Thanks A

RE I want to take a few minutes to give you an overview of the Lotus replacementPST Well try to get over there within the hr Virginia has a fire with MID to put out MP Original Message From Semperger Cara Sent Friday July AM To Purcell Mike Thompson Virginia Subject I want to take a few minutes to give you an overview of the Lotus replacement I need your eyes and input and also the input of anyone over there that will possible use this If you have a few this morning I have the app up now c

Parrellel login requests Cc po PST Paige Per Tom May Please give the following people parallel logins for scheduling on Tuesday for the Portland West Desk UBS Cara Semperger Donald Robinson Diane Cutsforth Estate Mike Purcell Serena Bishop Murray ONeil Les Rawson Thank you Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Estate NW Scheduling

Mona dealPST Cara Can you double check this deal for me Utah is saying that this deal did not flow after the I have looked at the SW sheet and it looks like it was cut but I want to make sure Deal Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

Scheduling deals for JanPST Cara I need to talk to you about Jan it looks like nothing has been auto scheduled Serena is going to start doing the California deals It looks like from the on nothing is in actuals Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

RE TAG PST The new tag is and I will correct this in the workspace today Thank you Serena MP Original Message From Bishop Serena Sent Wednesday February PM To Purcell Mike Semperger Cara Cutsforth Diane Robinson Donald Subject TAG Hey Guys Well I had to learn some Cod Scheduling fast this afternoon we really do need to exchange new cell phone numbers Anyway tag was incorrect and BPA called about I cancelled that tag and replaced it with tag I hope what I did was okay let me know if I should have done it differently On the NW sheet that tag number is highlighted in yellow in case there is a problem I assume the something needs to be corrected in the preschedule workspace but I dont know what it is so I will leave it to Cara or Donald to explain it to me in the morning Thanks again Serena

Sept Pinnacle dealPST Cara I have a dispute from Pinnacle West for Sept at Ive checked the sheets and the deal is in the sheet but there is no deal number This leads me to believe that there isnt a deal in Enpower The deal is PV HV and Staci remembers the problem Let me know when we can talk about this thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland

Enpower meeting moved to next week Wed pm May thBill NonPrivilegedpst Dear Traders We will have our regular biweekly Enpower meeting next Wednesday at PM in the CASCADE conference room unless otherwise notified of a conference room or time change Please make plans to be in attendance Agenda items Update on DPR impact for each trading group Discussion on establishing dollar threshold levels for each group Discussion on new ideas for timely dispute resolution The meeting should last minutes If you will not be there please let me know in advance who will be in attendance for your group Thanks and see you there Virginia and Mike

Biweekly Enpower meeting Cc po Bill NonPrivilegedpst Dear Traders We will have our regular biweekly Enpower meeting this Wednesday at PM in the CASCADE conference room unless otherwise notified of a conference room or time change Please make plans to be in attendance Agenda items Update on DPR impact for each trading group Discussion on establishing dollar threshold levels for each group Discussion on new ideas for timely dispute resolution The meeting should last minutes If you will not be there please let me know in advance who will be in attendance for your group Thanks and see you there Virginia and Mike

PPM and PNGC LDs Cc annuities entered to pass LDs from PNGC to PPM for an Oct dispute Deal comming from PPM with PAC G did not flow do to problems with PPM scheduling PNGC has passed a total of to us for damages We have passesd to PPM Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland
Smurfits numbers Cc numbers Smurfit has Please look over and approve Thanks Mike P Purcell Settlements Coordinator Volume ManagementPortland
